short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display tags before opening job cards.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Job Card Scanning
Display key tech stack as tags in job cards.
Less than 3 years of experience required jobs to show light green.
More experience required jobs show purple.
PR or citizen required jobs show red. (Builder doesn't fit this requirement)

More functions are coming soon.....

If you want to report any issues, please email me or report issues on GitHub.
